package.name: qbo_audio_control
package.description: qbo_audio_control package, catkinized package (indigo ok) This node disable the mic when the speaker sound is too much loud and the mic can capture it. Also control the output volume
package.author: Sergio Merino/s.merino@openqbo.org, Lennart Poettering/mzihzrgre (at) 0pointer (dot) de
